page.title: 09ST JOHN'S CHURCH
page.content: There is one church in our area,{St {John's Methodist Church.}St John's is sited on the corner of Birdsfoot Lane by the A6. The vicar is the Reverend Laurence Turner who has been working there for four and a half years. Five or six weddings and four or five baptisms are held there each year.The church,built in 1962,took five months to build.Inside the church are pews and a pulpit.At the front is the altar and above it there is a large wooden cross.There are six rooms used for different purposes. There is no choir in the church but there is a large organ and a piano. There is no graveyard at St John's. Activities held in the church are Boy's Brigade, aerobics,a youth club and a toddlers group. On average about eighty people attend the Sunday morning service.
